title: Penguin Bloom
description: When an unlikely ally enters the Bloom family's world in the form of an injured baby magpie they name Penguin, the bird’s arrival makes a profound difference in the struggling family’s life.

reviews.text: Naomi Watts was the only one who put more than average effort in this dull film.

(Mauro Lanari)Difficult to grasp the differences with "Soul Surfer" (McNamara 2011) and with the reception received by moviegoes and critics. An inspirational true drama, however formulaic and sweetened since it is aimed at those who have experienced similar traumas managing to overcome them, so I'd not recommend it to the Schumacher family, to the Zanardi, to Márquez or, outside the sporting sphere, to Sposini, Nuti and so on.
Es una película basada en una historia real; la actuación de Naomi Watts es muy buena y la cinematografía es excelente; es una experiencia entretenida y conmovedora.
The best. Ella es impresionante, la música es un boom y la actuación lo mejor.
